To ensure Cluster1 recovers from a Service1 failure in VM1, you should:

Configure monitoring for VM1 using Failover Cluster Manager. This is the correct tool for managing Hyper-V failover clusters and setting up monitoring for virtual machines within the cluster.

Set the Recovery settings for Service1 to Restart the Service. This is the most appropriate initial action to take when Service1 fails, as it attempts to resolve the issue by restarting the service itself before taking more drastic measures.
